trial_type.Description: Indicator of the type of action that is required

Levels.countdown: just getting ready no movement required
Levels.new_bloc_left_hand: warning that a block in which a left hand movement is required is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_right_hand: warning that a block in which a right hand movement is required is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_left_foot: warning that a block in which a left foot movement is required is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_right_foot: warning that a block in which a right foot movement is required is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_tongue: warning that a block in which a tongue movement is required is about to start
Levels.response_left_hand: a block in which a left hand movement is required is about to start
Levels.response_right_hand: a block in which a right hand movement is required is about to start
Levels.response_left_food: a block in which a left foot movement is required is about to start
Levels.response_right_food: a block in which a right foot movement is required is about to start
Levels.cross_fixation: fixation cross on screen no movement required

nbloc.Description: Progressive number of the block performed

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus in seconds

countdown_stim.Description: If used, decreasing number shown on the screen during the get-ready phase of the task
